name: oneapm-decorators
description: ES7 decorators that can be used in your app to track performance

scripts.preversion: rimraf lib && rimraf index.js && babel index.es6 --out-file index.js && babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.prestart: rimraf lib && rimraf index.js && babel index.es6 --out-file index.js && babel src --out-dir lib

author: wyvernnot
